projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
UI components: 
		divider & header, toast, drop-down lists, built in styles (colors, icons)
		Active frames (application covers, aka "live tiles")
		Action bars, title bars with buttons/controls
	App/Navigation patterns: 
		action menus, context menus, application menus; sheets (are these just Windows?)
		Bezel gestures
	Cards (similar to Android activities?)
		Sharing/invocation (similar to Android intents?)
	Which if any of the platform services listed at https://developer.blackberry.com/devzone/develop/platform_services/index.html
		Enterprise features, such as Push, Secure Transport, and Ent. app deployment, BB Messenger

comments.body: Closing ticket as BlackBerry is no longer supported by us.
